activities: We collect information from users when they register, sign up for our newsletter, respond to a survey or marketing communication.  This information is not mandatory, and is utilized to personalize a user's experience and to allow us to deliver the type of content and product offerings in which consumers are most interested.  This information is also utilized to improve our website in order to better serve customers, responding to your customer service requests, and administering contests, promotions, surveys or other site features.
eucountries: France, Germany, Italy, Netherlands, Spain, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Name, E-mail, Address, Phone Number, Organization, Settings Preferences
privacyprograms: Self-Regulated Compliance Program that adheres to Safe Harbor Privacy Principles
